description: ResourceQuotaSpec defines the desired hard limits to enforce for Quota.

hard.description: hard is the set of desired hard limits for each named resource. More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/policy/resource-quotas/

scopeSelector.description: scopeSelector is also a collection of filters like scopes that must match each object tracked by a quota but expressed using ScopeSelectorOperator in combination with possible values. For a resource to match, both scopes AND scopeSelector (if specified in spec), must be matched.

scopes.description: A collection of filters that must match each object tracked by a quota. If not specified, the quota matches all objects.
